reporter-output.line: SETUP - create new user and logout
Open url 'http://update.qa5.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Mouse over the 'People' menu link.
Click the 'Add user' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'People dialog'.
Enter '5500df37e2d44a7@8edc88317ff04d2.com' in the 'Username' text box.
Enter '5500df37e2d44a7@8edc88317ff04d2.com' in the 'E-mail address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Confirm password' text box.
Check the 'editor' check box.
Enter 'a76cfb61fc67495' in the 'First Name' text box.
Enter 'e9ca611430374de' in the 'Last Name' text box.
Click the 'Create new account' button.
Verify success message of 'A welcome message with further instructions has been e-mailed to the new user 5500df37e2d44a7@8edc88317ff04d2.com.' is present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Click the 'Logout' button.
STEP 1
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
STEP 2
Click the activer user menu link for logged in user '5500df37e2d44a7@8edc88317ff04d2.com'.
Click the 'Edit' link in the work bench.
Switch to the active frame titled '5500df37e2d44a7@8edc88317ff04d2.com dialog'.
STEP 3
Enter ' ' in the 'Password' text box.
Verify that password strength message 'The password does not include enough variation to be secure.' is present.
Verify that password strength message 'Password must contain at least 2 digits.' is present.
Verify that password strength message 'Password must be at least 8 characters in length.' is present.
Verify that password strength message 'Password must begin and end with a letter.' is present.
Verify that password strength message 'Password must contain at least one lowercase character.' is present.
STEP 4
Enter 'ABCDEFG1' in the 'Password' text box.
Verify that password strength message 'The password does not include enough variation to be secure.' is present.
Verify that password strength message 'Password must contain at least 2 digits.' is present.
Verify that password strength message 'Password must begin and end with a letter.' is present.
Verify that password strength message 'Password must contain at least one lowercase character.' is present.
Verify that password strength message 'Password must be at least 8 characters in length.' is not present.
STEP 5
Enter 'ABCDEF11' in the 'Password' text box.
Verify that password strength message 'The password does not include enough variation to be secure.' is present.
Verify that password strength message 'Password must begin and end with a letter.' is present.
Verify that password strength message 'Password must contain at least one lowercase character.' is present.
Verify that password strength message 'Password must be at least 8 characters in length.' is not present.
Verify that password strength message 'Password must contain at least 2 digits.' is not present.
STEP 6
Enter 'ABCDE11H' in the 'Password' text box.
Verify that password strength message 'The password does not include enough variation to be secure.' is present.
Verify that password strength message 'Password must contain at least one lowercase character.' is present.
Verify that password strength message 'Password must be at least 8 characters in length.' is not present.
Verify that password strength message 'Password must contain at least 2 digits.' is not present.
Verify that password strength message 'Password must begin and end with a letter.' is not present.
STEP 7
Enter 'ABcDE11H' in the 'Password' text box.
Verify the password strength container is not present.
STEP 8
Enter '5500df37e2d44a7@8edc88317ff04d2.com' in the 'Password' text box.
Verify that password strength message 'The password does not include enough variation to be secure.' is present.
Verify that password strength message 'Password must not contain the username.' is present.
STEP 9
Enter 'ABcDE11H' in the 'Password' text box.
Enter 'aBcDE11H' in the 'Confirm password' text box.
Verify password match text equals 'no'.
STEP 10
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Current password' text box.
Enter 'A' in the 'Password' text box.
Enter 'A' in the 'Confirm password' text box.
Click the 'Save' button.
STEP 11
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Current password' text box.
Enter 'pa555word' in the 'Password' text box.
Enter 'pa555word' in the 'Confirm password' text box.
Verify password match text equals 'yes'.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'The changes have been saved.' is present.
STEP 12
Enter 'pa555word' in the 'Current password' text box.
Enter 'pa555!@#$%^&*word' in the 'Password' text box.
Enter 'pa555!@#$%^&*word' in the 'Confirm password' text box.
Verify password match text equals 'yes'.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'The changes have been saved.' is present.
STEP 13
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Click the 'Logout' button.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'People' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Password policies' menu link.
Click the 'List' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Password policies dialog'.
Click the 'view' link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'NBCU Password Policy dialog'.
Verify the text 'Expiration' is present on the page.
Verify the text '365' is present on the page.
